name: Bad Eggs Online 2
storyline: Bad Eggs Online 2 is a multiplayer game where you are put to the test against your opponent. This is a strategy game therefore you will have to carefully think through your tactics to beat your opponent. There are many different crazy weapons you can use, some more powerful than others. The most powerful weapons are in little quantities, so you’ll have to plan your use of them perfectly. Your aim is very important in this game, as it can make the difference between a win and a loss. You are playing against REAL people and are able to use the in-game chat to communicate. Enjoy bad eggs online 2 unblocked.
